title: Sans Serif font + alternative suggestions?
content:
I've been looking for these fonts or similar font(s) for a while now.  
Any idea what they could be? or any suggestions to similar fonts would be appreciated.

Thank you

Font: 

 akkurat 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072634/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

comments.content: yeah classic akkurat, little bit out of date. Looks around
Avenir Bold is a nice sample

Axis is a good option too
